javazoom.upload.parsing
Class CfuMultipartParser

java.lang.Object
  javazoom.upload.parsing.CfuMultipartParser
public class CfuMultipartParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class links the Commons-FileUpload multipart parser to UploadBean. This parser stores uploaded file whose size > MEMBUFFER into a temporary folder.

Field Summary
static int MEMBUFFER
          Store file in memory is size < MEMBUFFER.
